title: Test Survey with Multiple Question Types
description: This is a test survey to demonstrate all question types and features.

welcome.title: Welcome to the Test Survey
welcome.message: This survey demonstrates all the available question types including radio buttons, text inputs, and Likert scales.

thankYou.title: Thank You!
thankYou.message: Your test responses have been recorded. This survey was used to test the file upload feature.

questions.question: How would you rate the file upload feature?
What additional features would you like to see in the survey taker?
The survey interface is user-friendly and intuitive.
Would you recommend this survey tool to others?
